Name: City of South Perth Council / City of South Perth Historical Society, Local Studies Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon , Wed and Thurs 1-5pm, Sat 9-12; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. General copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: All documentary material pertaining wholly or partly to the localities contained within the City of South Perth.

Contact.Street address: South Perth Heritage House, 111 Mill Point Road, South Perth 6151
